CustomField.formula: IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_In_Transit_Home_Automati__c = TRUE, "Home Automation"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_In_Transit_Pest_Control__c = TRUE, "Pest Control"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_In_Transit_Solar__c = TRUE,"Solar"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_In_Transit_Water__c = TRUE,"Water"+BR(), "")+ IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Installation_In_Transit_Window__c =TRUE,"Window"+BR(),"")
CustomField.label: Automatic Text -Â In Transit
